description_txt: stated on March 8, 2011 in his State of the State speech.:
quote_txt: "On my first day in office, I ordered a review of every regulation in the pipeline and every contract exceeding $1 million."

description_txt: stated on March 3, 2011 in a speech in the Senate:
quote_txt: "Hitler didn't want unions. Stalin didn't want unions. Mubarak didn't want independent unions. These autocrats in history don't want independent unions."

description_txt: stated on March 6, 2011 in an interview on NBC's "Meet the Press":
quote_txt: "Secretly, unbeknownst to members of Congress, over $105 billion was hidden in the Obamacare legislation."

description_txt: stated on March 3, 2011 in a statement made by a staffer during a court hearing.:
quote_txt: Damage by protesters to the Wisconsin state Capitol will cost $7.5 million to repair.

description_txt: stated on February 20, 2011 in comments to the Richmond Times-Dispatch:
quote_txt: In the past decade, K-12 funding has grown six times faster than the rate of enrollment.

description_txt: stated on March 7, 2011 in a chain email apparently focused on Wisconsin corrections workers:
quote_txt: State employees will have to pay 100 percent of their pensions and health insurance after 2012.

description_txt: stated on February 20, 2011 in an appearance on a TV interview program:
quote_txt: Wisconsin state and local government workers pay "$500, $600 or in some cases, $1,000" per year in union dues.

description_txt: stated on February 22, 2011 in a web post.:
quote_txt: Says nobody in higher education believes Gov. Rick Perry’s proposal to "serve up $10,000 college degrees" is possible.

description_txt: stated on March 3, 2011 in a radio ad.:
quote_txt: Says "union bosses" bused protesters to a Central Florida education protest.

description_txt: stated on March 2, 2011 in an interview on Fox News:
quote_txt: "Under the clear letter of the law, (Justice Clarence Thomas) must recuse himself" from the case challenging the constitutionality of the health care law.

description_txt: stated on March 2, 2011 in an interview on Fox News:
quote_txt: Says Justice Elena Kagan recused herself in "many cases where she had little role" as solicitor general, simply because of the appearance of a conflict of interest.

description_txt: stated on February 22, 2011 in a news release:
quote_txt: In slashing $1.7 billion from Social Security, "Rep. Jim Renacci may end up forcing the entire agency to ... shut down for a month, causing seniors to not get their benefits on time, halting claims processing, and forcing new retirees and disabled workers into a backlog."

description_txt: stated on March 1, 2011 in an appearance on Fox News.:
quote_txt: The health care bill has "six years of costs against 10 years of tax revenue."

description_txt: stated on February 27, 2011 in a Washington Post profile:
quote_txt: "We closed that plant down. It was a $27 million-dollar plant, operating full steam, and we closed it down."

description_txt: stated on February 16, 2011 in a New York Times column:
quote_txt: Texas "ranks third in teen pregnancies... and it is No. 1 in repeat teen pregnancies."

description_txt: stated on February 8, 2011 in his blog:
quote_txt: Says city of Portland has a one-time $22 million surplus

name_txt: Georgia Association of Latino Elected Officials
description_txt: stated on March 2, 2011 in an email newsletter:
quote_txt: Georgia legislation on immigration is a "copycat" of an Arizona immigration bill.

description_txt: stated on February 22, 2011 in a web commentary:
quote_txt: "Last year it was discovered that Rhode Island's public employees ranked 4th in average pay, while the private sector ranked 23rd."
footer: By C. Eugene Emery Jr. • March 7, 2011

description_txt: stated on February 1, 2011 in a letter.:
quote_txt: Texas would have to increase current state spending by 28 percent just to reach the national average for spending per resident.

description_txt: stated on February 27, 2011 in a TV interview:
quote_txt: Says Sheldon Whitehouse said on Senate floor: "Everybody in Rhode Island who disagrees with me about Obamacare is an Aryan, is a white supremacist."

description_txt: stated on March 21, 2011 in a House floor speech.:
quote_txt: A telephone company will no longer have to provide landline service to customers if there is an alternative provider, including wireless.

description_txt: stated on February 21, 2011 in a House floor speech.:
quote_txt: A telecom bill could keep the State Corporation Commission from getting rate-of-return information from electric utilities.

description_txt: stated on February 8, 2011 in a legislative hearing:
quote_txt: Says Oregon recyclers can't recycle plastic bags

description_txt: stated on February 2, 2011 in an e-mail blast.:
quote_txt: Says broken compact fluorescent light bulbs "allegedly cause migraines and epilepsy attacks."

description_txt: stated on March 2, 2011 in a speech to the American Association of State Highway and Transportation Officials.:
quote_txt: "Thirty-five states have accepted high-speed intercity rail money."

description_txt: stated on March 2, 2011 in a television ad:
quote_txt: Under Gov. Scott Walker’s proposals, "Money is being taken away from workers, and the tax breaks given to major corporations. "

description_txt: stated on March 3, 2010 in a video news release:
quote_txt: In 2011, "the average annual compensation for a teacher in the Milwaukee Public Schools system will exceed $100,000."

description_txt: stated on February 24, 2011 in an appearance on a TV interview program:
quote_txt: "The average (public school) teacher in Wisconsin’s making $89,000 a year" in salary and benefits.

description_txt: stated on March 2, 2011 in a news release:
quote_txt: As part of efforts to rein in protesters, Republicans in Wisconsin have "bolted windows inside the Capitol shut."

description_txt: stated on February 25, 2011 in his radio program:
quote_txt: Says Michelle Obama has 43 people on her staff; Nancy Reagan had just 3.
